channel.title: When staff log in it yells
channel.description: whell title says it. when a staff member log in it should yell to all that ex. doug has logged in so it would be. "server admin doug has logged in!" can someone help me?

item.title: When staff log in it yells
item.dc:creator: @Mercifies Mercifies
item.description:
@Mercifies wrote:

Yes but he wants it for a staff member, not him. It would be…

if (playerRights == 2) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Administrator " +playerName+ " has logged in"; } else if (playerRights == 1) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Moderator " +playerName+ " has logged in"; }

Read full topic
item.source: When staff log in it yells

item.title: When staff log in it yells
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

In void initialize() you can add

if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("blah")) { yell("Message..."); }

Read full topic
